nodes.text: The Harken was a Low Altitude Assault Transport/infantry (LAAT/i) gunship that saw service with the Grand Army of the Republic during the early stages of the Clone Wars. Harken provided air support for Delta Squad at the First Battle of Geonosis, during which it destroyed an OG-9 homing spider droid that had been threatening squad members Boss and Scorch.

The gunship Harken first appeared in the PC and Xbox video game Star Wars: Republic Commando, released in 2005. Boss disembarks from the same gunship at the beginning of the level, but it is assumed to be a game mechanic and canonically different gunship as it is the only gunship model used in that level.
